name: Rytmik (itch)
description:
RYTMIK

                                                       A RHYTHM GAME FOR WINDOWS

                                             Rytmik is a rhythm game like the Guitar Hero

Controls: 1= Yellow Fret, 2= Red Fret, 3= Blue Fret, 4= Green Fret

                                                 there's not a strum key like the guitar hero

you can use the soundtracks in your videos or games, if you will use any soundtrack, then credit me for the soundtracks

If you like the game then share it with your friends, i will thank you so much
